mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Smith, Fontaine to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Smith, Fontaine
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dated Mannington Sept 1st 1861. to F. H. Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] About five oclock AM 2 Pickets Capt Craig 60 Ohio was driven in who reported a body of 37 Rebels were organized but no attack no damage to road as yet reported from the appearance of the ground which the pickets say the Rebels occupied there is no doubt but that there was a force of some size F. Smith
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Smith, Fontaine
Mannington, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
